comments.en: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum

Works with the "foo2zjs" and "pbmtozjs" drivers. The "foo2zjs" driver is derived from the "pbmtozjs" driver and supports more paper sizes and options.

PCL is only implemented in the Windows driver, to support DOS applications in the DOS box of Windows. The printer has only 1 MB of RAM and 32 kb (!) of ROM and is USB only.

HP tries to enter the super-low-cost-disposable-printer market with this model. It costs only around 250 bucks.

The firmware of the printer must be uploaded after turning it on. Note that you cannot simply upload it by commands like "cat sihp1000.img > /dev/usb/lp0". The "foo2zjs" driver package contains a script to do the upload.
